subject: OFFICE OF FOREIGN ASSETS CONTROL (OFAC)
Re: OFFICE OF FOREIGN ASSETS CONTROL (OFAC)
body:
Hello Office Hon. Janet L. Yellen,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing such detailed information about the situation. I must say, it's quite surprising to hear that my name is on the United States Financial blacklist. I'm just a simple person who doesn't have much knowledge about these financial matters.

I'm curious though, how did my name end up on this list? And what are these two metallic boxes you mentioned? What do they contain?

Also, you mentioned that it will cost me a little money to get the United State Office of Foreign Assets Control US OFAC form letter. Could you please provide more details about this cost?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Aaron

subject: Re: OFFICE OF FOREIGN ASSETS CONTROL (OFAC)
body:

I want let you know your name was in the United States Financial blacklist, Because you are defrauded and you are scammer victim and if you are ready and interested to remove your name from the United States Financial blacklist kindly comply with me.
 Meanwhile, I want you to follow my instructions and I give you %100 guarantee once you can get the payment done your name will been removed from United States Financial blacklist, you can decided what platform you will use to send the money so  I can provide the details either,  Bitcoins, Bank to Bank Account. I await your  response.
 Please note;  for the removal of your name from the  U.S. OFAC Financial Blacklist, you are required to provide the below listed information. Please take note; only me has the  authority for the removal of your name off the U.S. Government  OFAC Financial Blacklist for payment of your intercepted funds to you; 1).  Your full name;2).  Your valid ID Copy;3).  Your Residential Address;4).  Your Contact Phone Number ; ThanksBest RegardsHon. Mrs.  Janet L. Yellen

subject: Re: OFFICE OF FOREIGN ASSETS CONTROL (OFAC)
body:

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite surprising to hear that my name is on the United States Financial blacklist, I had no idea about this.

I'm interested in getting my name removed from this list as you suggested. However, before we proceed, could you please provide me with more details? For instance, how did my name end up on this list? And what exactly does it mean to be on this list?

Also, I would like to know more about the payment process. How much is required for the removal of a name from the blacklist? And why is there a need for payment?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Aaron

body:
